class.name: ArrayOccluder3D
class.brief_description: 3D polygon shape for use with occlusion culling in [OccluderInstance3D].
class.description: [ArrayOccluder3D] stores an arbitrary 3D polygon shape that can be used by the engine's occlusion culling system. This is analogous to [ArrayMesh], but for occluders. See [OccluderInstance3D]'s documentation for instructions on setting up occlusion culling.
